mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_EMPLOYEE m
1=1
and m.V7_E_NAME like concat('%', '#',#{v7EName}, '%') escape '#'
and m.V7_E_NAME like concat('%', '#',#{v7ENum}, '%') escape '#'
and m.V7_E_NAME like concat('%', '#',#{v7EPhone}, '%') escape '#'
and m.v7_e_create_date >= #{v7EBeginTime}
and m.v7_e_create_date <= #{v7EEndTime}
and m.v7_e_status != 3
SELECT e.ID id , e.v7_e_num v7ENum, e.v7_e_name v7EName, e.v7_e_real_name v7ERealName, e.v7_e_position v7EPosition FROM V7_EMPLOYEE e WHERE e.v7_e_status = 1
SELECT * FROM V7_EMPLOYEE e WHERE e.v7_e_name = #{inName}
SELECT * FROM V7_EMPLOYEE e WHERE e.v7_e_phone = #{inName}
SELECT * FROM V7_EMPLOYEE e WHERE e.v7_e_status = 1 and e.v7_e_position != 10
mapper.sql: ID, v7_e_num, v7_e_name, v7_e_real_name, v7_e_sex, v7_e_birthday, v7_e_phone, v7_e_position, v7_e_join_date, v7_e_password, v7_e_status, v7_e_last_login, v7_e_last_ip, v7_e_sum_login, v7_e_online_time, v7_e_remarks, v7_e_create_user, v7_e_create_date, v7_e_update_user, v7_e_update_time, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from V7_EMPLOYEE
order by ${orderByClause}
